channel.title: Portugal on Gladio Free Europe
channel.description: Recent content in Portugal on Gladio Free Europe

item.title: Christianity in Japan - Warlords at Worship
item.description: We continue our exploration of Christianity and Japan and how the faith became the subject of suspicion and persecution almost overnight.

item.title: Christianity in Japan - The Priest and the Pirate
item.description: The first installment of our series exploring the historical context of 16th and 17th century Catholicism in Japan.
